name: shopping
description: Manages the shopping experience, including product search, retrieval, and cart management.

skills.name: Search Products
skills.description: Search for products based on keywords or criteria.

skills.name: Check Inventory
skills.description: Check availability of a specific product.
examples: Check inventory for the red dress

skills.name: Get Product Info
skills.description: Retrieve detailed information about a product.
examples: Show me details for the smartphone stand
What are the specs for this camera?

skills.name: Manage Cart
skills.description: Add, remove, or view items in the shopping cart.
